title: Model-Based Engineering Approach Program for Strengthening Scientific Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher practical experience in science fields and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: A program targeting in-service professionals, emphasizing learner-tailored competency development to enhance workplace efficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can construct a problem-solving process in science using a model-based engineering approach.
Learners can systematically combine learning resources provided in the LMS to design work-applicable solutions.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans according to a competency development framework and evaluate the outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
